title: Scaramouch a philosopher, Harlequin a school-boy, bravo, merchant, and magician a comedy after the Italian manner : acted at the Theatre-Royal / written by Mr. Edward Ravenscroft.
author: Ravenscroft, Edward, 1654?-1707.
notes: Based in part on Molière's "Le bourgeois gentilhomme" and "Le mariage forcé".
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
